Control.Title: Linear Progress Bar
Control.Description: Indicates the progress of a task along a line.

Control.Title: Circular Progress Bar
Control.Description: Indicates the progress of a task along a circle.

Control.Title: Step Progress Bar
Control.Description: A multi step progress bar tracks the status of a process.

Sample.Title: Order Tracking
Sample.WhatsNew: Provided tooltip support for the .NET MAUI Step progress bar control.
